function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of research on the influence of cultural factors on workplace viral transmission and interaction with COVID-19 IPC measures","Impact":"Increased risk of workplace viral transmission and ineffective COVID-19 IPC measures","Mitigation":"Conduct tailored education initiatives to address cultural factors and their influence on workplace viral transmission","Technologies":"Tailored educational programs, cultural sensitivity training","People":"Workers, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of effective contact tracing methods and public engagement in contact tracing","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of contact tracing and increased barriers to public engagement","Mitigation":"Develop and implement effective contact tracing methods, address privacy concerns, mistrust, and digital challenges to improve public engagement","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, privacy-enhancing technologies, public engagement platforms","People":"Health authorities, public health agencies, technology developers","Owner":"Health authorities, technology developers, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of experimental research on indoor environmental adjustments and COVID-19 outbreaks","Impact":"Inability to effectively mitigate COVID-19 outbreaks and superspreading events related to airborne transmission","Mitigation":"Conduct experimental research on indoor environmental adjustments, improve workplace ventilation, and implement air-purification regimes","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air-purification technologies, indoor air quality monitors","People":"Workplace managers, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Workplace managers, public health organizations, research institutions"}]}
